summary: We also published an "Easy Read" version of this report. Easy Read is a way of making written information easier to understand. We published the Easy Read version to make our report more accessible to certain people with intellectual and developmental disabilities. One in 4 U.S. adults reports having a disability. We spoke to experts and reviewed literature to identify barriers people with disabilities may...
title: Health Care Accessibility: Further Efforts Needed to Address Barriers for People with Disabilities
